dependencies.description: An interpreter for the PostScript language and for PDF.
dependencies.name: ghostscript

dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.
dependencies.name: gnuconfig

dependencies.description:
Netpbm - graphics tools and converters. A whole bunch of utilities for
primitive manipulation of graphic images. Wide array of converters from
one graphics format to another. E.g. from g3 fax format to jpeg. Many
basic graphics editing tools such as magnifying and cropping.
dependencies.name: netpbm

dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.
dependencies.name: perl

dependencies.description: Poppler is a PDF rendering library based on the xpdf-3.0 code base.
dependencies.name: poppler

dependencies.description:
TeX Live is an easy (we hope) way to get up and running with the TeX
document production system. It provides a comprehensive TeX system with
binaries for most flavors of Unix, including GNU/Linux, macOS, and also
Windows. It includes all the major TeX-related programs, macro packages,
and fonts that are free software, including support for many languages
around the world.
dependencies.name: texlive

description:
LaTeX2HTML is a utility that converts LaTeX documents to web pages in
HTML.
name: latex2html

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
